title: Segregate buyers by elasticity to price discrim

content.prompt: Which of the following is a necessary condition for price discrimination?

choices.label: Resale of the product or service is possible.
The seller can separate consumers according to their elasticities of demand.
The seller is a perfectly competitive firm.
Buyers are aware of prices charged to other buyers.
